results.title: ACUTE KIDNEY INJURY CAUSED BY Crotalus AND Bothrops SNAKE VENOM: A REVIEW OF EPIDEMIOLOGY, CLINICAL MANIFESTATIONS AND TREATMENT
results.journal: Rev Inst Med Trop Sao Paulo
results.text_hl: Recent studies have been carried out searching for complementary therapies for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Accidental_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081084 @@@ophidic accidents@@@, including the use of @CHEMICAL_Thioctic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008063 @@@lipoic acid@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Allopurinol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000493 @@@allopurinol@@@.
